name: ARI KURU: Clu Clu Puzzle of Chip, the ant
name_original: ARI KURU: Clu Clu Puzzle of Chip, the ant
description:
Nostalgic Puzzle Action Game!
Tap the panel! Go toward the goal!
Avoid the enemies and collect candy!
It's an easy-to-operate but heart-pounding game.

Let's go on a journey with Ant Chip!

Stage will increase!
Don't miss it.
Please wait new update without uninstall.


[How to play]
- Tap to rotate a panel
- It's a clear when you reach the goal, big-tree panel
- Ant panel, rainbow panel and big-tree panel are not rotated
- Unlock next stage when you clear a stage
- There are three types of candy in each stage
- You can clear a stage without collecting all candy
- You can check the candy on the list
- Ant turn back when ant hits against a dead end
- It's game over when the Ant hit the enemy
- After tap the Mizuame button, enemy will stop for a while by tapping the enemy
- After tap the Kompeito button, enemy will go away by tapping the enemy
- Speed-up when you push fast-forward button



Give it a try right now.


* Works with iPhone4S+, iPod touch 5th Generation+ and iPad 3rd Generation+
* This app is free to play, but you can use some in-game items which will require payment
